markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you forgot your GCash MPIN, you can reset it and set a new MPIN. You can also use face verification to get back into your account. To keep your account safe, change your MPIN every 3 months.

Note:

Your MPIN is different from your GCash Card PIN. To learn how to reset your GCash Card MPIN, [click here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286846758297-How-do-I-reset-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-PIN).

Learn how to reset your MPIN below:

1\. Open the GCash app, and tap **Forgot MPIN?**

2\. Tap **Send Code** then enter the 6-digit OTP sent via SMS and tap **Submit**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/28984310307097)**

3\. Prepare yourself for a selfie scan and tap **Next**

4\. Take your selfie scan then enter your New MPIN and tap **Submit**

You will be led to a screen that confirms you have successfully reset your MPIN.

Should you need more assistance, tap ![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/29035518723993) .
